text.section: There is an Education and Workforce Training Coordinating Council for Correctional Institutions under the jurisdiction of the Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services and the Department.

section.section:
Four of the members of the Council shall be residents of this State appointed by the Governor for a term of 4 years who each shall serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies as follows:
two representing the business community;
a former offender; and
one member of the general public.

text.section:
Each member of the Council:
serves without compensation; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses in accordance with the Standard State Travel Regulations.

section.section: The Secretary of Public Safety and Correctional Services and the Secretary shall serve as cochairs of the Council.

The Council:
shall meet at least four times per year;
shall designate the time and place of its meetings; and
may adopt rules for the conduct of its meetings.
The Council shall be within the Department for administrative and budgetary purposes.
The Department shall provide technical and clerical assistance and support to the Council.
